articles.title: Condolences to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
articles.content:
Condolences to Kim Jong Un from Algerian President
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a message of condolences from Algerian President Abdelaziz Bouteflika on Jan. 2 on the demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					The message said:
					
					It was with great sorrow that I learnt of the passing away of HE Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					I, on behalf of the Algerian people and government and on my own, express our most heartfelt condolences to Your Excellency and extend firm solidarity to you and the friendly people of the DPRK.
					
					The feats of the great man who devoted his all to the prosperity of the DPRK and its people will be recorded in history.
					
					Algeria will always remember as the eternal friend the great man who worked hard to strengthen the traditional relationship of friendship and cooperation between our two countries.
					
					Please accept, Your Excellency, the assurances of highest consideration.

articles.title: Amnesty to Be Applied to Convicts in DPRK
articles.content:
Amnesty to Be Applied to Convicts in DPRK
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The DPRK will apply amnesty to convicts from February 1 on the occasion of the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung and the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, according to a decree of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK on Jan. 5.
					The Cabinet and relevant organs will take working measures for those to be released thanks to the amnesty to work and live under stable conditions.
					
					It is the steadfast will of the Workers' Party of Korea and state to embody generation after generation the noble benevolent and all-embracing politics of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who energetically worked till the last moments of their great lives, undergoing all sufferings for the people's happiness throughout them, always finding themselves among them, the decree said.

articles.title: DPRK to Publish "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works"
articles.content:
DPRK to Publish "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works"
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on Sunday made public the following report on the publication of "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works", a library of the Juche idea, the Songun idea, on the occasion of the 70th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il:
					Now the army and people of the DPRK are speeding up the grand advance to glorify 2012 as a year of proud victory when an era of prosperity is unfolding true to the behests of Kim Jong Il under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					Kim Jong Il, the peerlessly great man, is an outstanding thinker-theoretician, prominent statesman and rare illustrious commander of Songun produced by humankind.
					
					Shouldering upon himself the heavy burdens of the Korean revolution, he led the revolutionary cause of Juche, the socialist cause to victory for many years and thus performed enormous feats which would remain long in the history of the country.
					
					He strengthened the WPK into a great party in which monolithic ideology and leadership and continuity are firmly established, a veteran and tested, revolutionary party guiding the era of Juche and Songun and a genuine motherly party which faithfully serves the popular masses with its roots taken deep into their mind and enjoys their absolute support and trust.
					
					Under the banner of Songun (army-first policy) he built up the Korean People's Army into an army strong in ideology and faith which regards it as its life and soul to devotedly defend the leader, ranks of ardent patriots who love the country and people very much and reliably protect them with arms, and an invincible revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu ready to defeat any aggressors at one stroke.
					
					He turned the DPRK into the homeland of Songun, where the leader, party and masses form a harmonious whole and the great army-people unity is successfully realized, and a socialist state centered on the popular masses where priority is given to the demand and interests of the popular masses and everything serves them.
					
					With great magnanimity based on patriotism, he opened a fresh turning phase for Korea's reunification, the supreme task of the nation, and raised the prestige of the WPK and the DPRK in every way and unfolded a new chapter for the development of international relations based on independence through his tested and energetic external activities.
					
					Thanks to his indefatigable Songun revolutionary leadership, world-startling miracles and changes were wrought in all domains of social life including politics, military affairs, economy and culture and the new era of building a thriving nation, a new history of unprecedented prosperity, has been opened in the country.
					
					While leading the revolution and construction for a long period, he authored a large number of celebrated works through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and developed in depth the immortal Juche idea, the Songun idea, making distinguished contributions to the development of the progressive idea of mankind.
					
					His works systematically and comprehensively deal with the lines and policies of the WPK and expound on a scientific basis all the theoretical and practical problems arising in the revolution and construction. They also give extensive and profound analysis of the ideas and theories and cultural assets won by mankind in different periods of history as well as the achievements, experience and lessons gained in the struggle for independence of the popular masses.
					
					For originality and validity of the ideas and theories contained in them, those works have served as an ever-victorious banner steering the times and revolution and a true textbook in the struggle for independence of the popular masses.
					
					The WPK Central Committee will publish the book "Complete Collection of Kim Jong Il's Works" on the occasion of his 70th birth anniversary, out of the desire of the Korean people and the world progressives to glorify his feats for all ages.
					
					It is high honor and pride of the WPK and the Korean people to release this book which comprehends the immortal ideological and theoretical exploits performed by Kim Jong Il on behalf of the country and the people, the times and history.
					
					The book, an eternal treasure of the WPK and the Korean revolution, will be greatly helpful to fully arming all the party members, service personnel, working people and school youth and children with the revolutionary outlook on the world, accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche and realizing global independence.

articles.title: Rally of KPA Service Personnel Held to Renew Their Pledge
articles.content:
Rally of KPA Service Personnel Held to Renew Their Pledge
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- A solemn rally of service personnel of the three services of the Korean People's Army took place at the plaza of the Kumsusan Memorial Palace on Monday to renew their pledge to implement the behests of leader Kim Jong Il and remain true to the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un .
					Present there were Ri Yong Ho, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea and chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Kim Yong Chun, member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK, vice-chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and minister of the People's Armed Forces, Kim Jong Gak, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and first vice-director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces and service personnel of the KPA.
					
					The participants observed a moment's silence in humblest reverence in memory of Kim Jong Il.
					
					A message of pledge to Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the WPK and the Korean people, was read out by Ri Yong Ho at the rally.
					
					All the service personnel of the KPA more keenly felt the mission of the arms of Mt. Paektu through the unswerving Songun will of Kim Jong Un who solemnly declared that he would accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche the way Kim Jong Il did with a firm hold on the party and the army during the mourning in December in bitter tears, the message said.
					
					The service personnel of the three services of the KPA see an immensely rosy future of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea and feel firmly convinced of a reunified thriving nation, when watching Kim Jong Un standing at the forefront commanding post of the revolution, shouldering upon himself the destiny of the country and the nation, it noted, and went on:
					
					We will build a ten thousands-fold bulwark for protecting the supreme commander and become rifles and bombs to serve as Kim Jong Un first line lifeguards and Kim Jong Un first line death-defying corps by more dynamically conducting the movement for winning the title of the O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment, holding high the slogan "Let Us Defend the Party Central Committee Headed by the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un with Our Lives!" despite any storm and stress.
					
					We will lead the whole country and all the people in the general offensive to carry out the tasks laid in the decision of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee, the joint calls of the C.C. and the Central Military Commission of the WPK and the joint New Year editorial and bring about uninterrupted innovations in combat training, arms and equipment mobilization preparations, the establishment of steel-like military discipline and noble moral traits and lifestyle and the bolstering of companies.
					
					We will successfully play the role as a standard-bearer and shock brigade in the grand advance for this year to significantly commemorate the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, the 70th birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il and the 80th anniversary of the foundation of the KPA. 
					
					The message stressed that the whole army would more sharply whet the bayonets of the revolution so that it may dash ahead like the wind and wipe out the enemies to the last one if they intrude into the inviolable sky, land and seas of the country even 0.001 mm and thus accomplish the historic cause of national reunification without fail. 
					
					Loudly shouting "Devoted Defence of Kim Jong Un!" and "National Reunification" in response to the message of pledge, all the participants made a solemn pledge to carry through the behests of Kim Jong Il and remain true to the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					Speeches were made at the rally to evince their resolutions on behalf of service personnel of the three services of the KPA. 
					
					Noting that all the officers and men of the KPA are the descendants of the President and soldiers and disciples of Kim Jong Il, who have grown up under the care of the great persons born of Mt. Paektu, the speakers pledged themselves to hold the President and Kim Jong Il in high esteem for all ages and firmly defend and glorify the Songun revolutionary feats of Kim Jong Il for all eternity.
					
					There was a march past of the service personnel of the three services of the KPA at the plaza.

articles.title: Eternal Lifeline of KPA
articles.content:
Eternal Lifeline of KPA
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The joint New Year editorial says that the entire army should place absolute trust in and follow Kim Jong Un and become human rifles and bombs to defend him unto death, holding high the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the dear respected Comrade Kim Jong Un!"
					The slogan calling for devotedly defending the headquarters of the revolution has become famous in the country since August 25, Juche 49 (1960) when leader Kim Jong Il started his Songun (military-first) revolutionary leadership.
					
					That day he inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division of the Korean People's Army (KPA). Seeing the slogan "Let us defend with our very lives the Party Central Committee headed by the respected Comrade Kim Il Sung!" hung on the front wall of the soldiers' hall, he said it reflected the unshakable faith of the Korean people and servicepersons. 
					
					He, regarding it as an issue decisive of the revolutionary cause of Juche to defend the headquarters of the revolution at the cost of one's life, continued inspection tours of KPA units to bring up the servicepersons to be the revolutionary soldiers infinitely loyal to President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					Under his leadership, the KPA was strengthened into the army of the leader and the Party.
					
					Devotedly defending the headquarters of revolution still remains the revolutionary mission and the lifeline of the KPA. 
					
					The Korean revolutionary armed forces are determined to be faithful to the leadership of Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un in national defense and building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: News Reports on Kim Jong Il's Activities Go On
articles.content:
News Reports on Kim Jong Il's Activities Go On
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- News reports on revolutionary activities of leader Kim Jong Il had encouraged the Korean people to turn out in the effort for the building of a thriving nation. 
					When the imperialists were trying hard to stifle the DPRK, the leader continued inspecting many military units, including frontline units, and giving field guidance to industrial establishments across the country even in sultry and biting days.   
					
					His devoted effort led to tremendous achievements in national defense and socialist construction.  
					
					After the demise of the leader, the Korean people could no longer listen to media reports on his activities devoted to the future of the country and the happiness of the people. 
					
					They, however, listened to the news that Kim Jong Un, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, inspected the Seoul Ryu Kyong Su 105 Guards Tank Division on the New Year's Day. 
					
					During the inspection he paid deep concern to servicepersons' combat preparedness and life. The news reminded the people of leader Kim Jong Il. It also made them feel that the leader will always be with them because they are guided by the supreme commander, identical to him in idea, leadership art and personality.

articles.title: DPRK's Treasured Swords for Victory in Its New Century
articles.content:
DPRK's Treasured Swords for Victory in Its New Century
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- For the army and people of the DPRK, Juche 101(2012) is the year when a new century starts.
					The joint New Year editorial defines the courageous mettle of the brilliant commanders of Mt. Paektu and their way of offensive as treasured swords for sure victory in the grand march of the new century.
					
					In the past century Kim Il Sung's nation won victories with the treasured swords.
					
					President Kim Il Sung achieved the historic cause of the national liberation through a protracted fight against the Japanese imperialists with neither state-backing home front nor support from a regular army.
					
					When the U.S. imperialists, boasting of their numerical and technical superiority over the DPRK, launched an attack on the country, backed by its 15 satellites, the south Korean puppet army and Japanese militarists, he won the fatherland liberation war in the spirit of stubborn offensive.
					
					Kim Il Sung made the U.S. imperialists kneel down before the Korean people with a strong will to answer their retaliation with retaliation and their total war with a total war when their armed spy ship "Pueblo" illegally entered the territorial waters of the DPRK, driving the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					In 1993, after the end of the cold war, when the imperialists launched a general offensive against the DPRK to stifle it, causing deep concern of the world, leader Kim Jong Il, an illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu, declared a state of semi-war in the country and the DPRK quitted the Nuclear Non-proliferation Treaty (NPT), making the imperialists bite the dust.
					
					The world admired Kim Jong Il, correct in judging, strong in resolution and merciless in strike, for his invincible spirit of offensive, boldness and superb stratagem.
					
					Kim Jong Il, with an iron-willed pluck and boldness, won one victory after another in the politico-military confrontation with the imperialists.
					
					The DPRK has become a socialist bulwark which the enemies do not dare to provoke. It is thanks to the revolutionary disposition and leadership of the illustrious commanders of Mt. Paektu, who overcame all adversities with confidence in victory. 
					
					The Korean revolution will continue to emerge victorious under the leadership of Kim Jong Un, another illustrious commander identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: New Supermarket Opens in Pyongyang
articles.content:
New Supermarket Opens in Pyongyang
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- A large-scale supermarket has opened in Kwangbok Street, Pyongyang.
					The Kwangbok Area Supermarket has all its management and service activities computerized and digitized, ranging from the examining, warehousing and selling of goods to price counting.
					
					Each floor has several automatic cash desks.
					
					The supermarket is supplied with home and foreign-made products which are in demand in the country.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il visited the supermarket in December last year before its opening and took measures necessary for its service activities for the people.

articles.title: DPRK Labor Hero Conferred on Merited Designer
articles.content:
DPRK Labor Hero Conferred on Merited Designer
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Ko Pu Ung, chief engineer of the Pyongyang City Design Institute, was awarded the DPRK title of Labor Hero and Gold Medal (Hammer and Sickle) and Order of National Flag First Class, according to the January 9 decree of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly.
					Working at designing sector for 40 odd years, Ko has perfectly designed a lot of monumental edifices. Among them are the Mansudae Art Theatre, Grand People's Study House, Hyangsan Hotel, Pyongyang Circus Theatre, Youth Park Open-air Theatre and the Ice Rink.

articles.title: All Koreans Urged to Make Breakthrough for Independent Reunification
articles.content:
All Koreans Urged to Make Breakthrough for Independent Reunification
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- This year will mark the fifth anniversary of the October 4 Declaration adopted between the north and the south of Korea.
					The joint New Year editorial says that all the Korean people in the north, south and abroad should unite closely under the banners of the June 15 Joint Declaration and October 4 Declaration and give further spurs to the reunification movement. The joint editorial also says that by doing so, this year they should make a breakthrough for independent reunification.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il, together with south Korean President Roh Moo Hyun, signed the "Declaration for Development of North-South Relations and Peace and Prosperity" on October 4, Juche 96 (2007). 
					
					The Oct. 4 declaration provided by his patriotic will and resolution indicates ways of developing north-south relations, achieving peace on the Korean Peninsula, national co-prosperity and reunification, based on the idea of "By our nation itself", the main spirit of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					The declaration has won full support from people at home and abroad. Since it was adopted, the north and the south had held high-level negotiations and many-sided cooperation amid deep interests of all the fellow countrymen.
					
					Since they came to power, however, the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors have maliciously abused the historic June 15 joint declaration and October 4 declaration and staged various kinds of military exercises with foreign forces, rendering the situation of the Korean Peninsula more acute.
					
					The fact shows that with the traitors remaining in power in south Korea, can neither peace nor reunification be achieved on the peninsula.
					
					All the compatriots should launch vigorous efforts for moving up the day of national reunification in line with the north-south declarations.

articles.title: New Year's Concert Draws Many People
articles.content:
New Year's Concert Draws Many People
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The New Year's concert is going on at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre, drawing many people. It is given by the Unhasu Orchestra. 
					The numbers, with pictures of leader Kim Jong Il appearing in the stage background, praise the great exploits he performed in defending socialist Korea by dint of his Songun (military-first) politics, ushering in a new era of prosperity in the country and accomplishing the cause of human independence. 
					
					Among the repertoire are chorus "His Life", men's duet and chorus "We Long for You, General" and women's quintet "He Will Surely Come."
					
					They remind the audience of the leader's greatness and devoted effort for the building of a thriving nation.  
					
					Joining performers in singing the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Jong Il", the audience is determined to glorify the leader's great revolutionary life and feats for the people and country.

articles.title: Koreans in China Form Preparatory Committee for Commemorating February 16
articles.content:
Koreans in China Form Preparatory Committee for Commemorating February 16
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the General Association of Koreans in China (GAKC)  for commemorating February 16 (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il) was formed on January 6.
					Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of GAKC, was selected chairwoman of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to hold colorful events including the memorial meeting, exhibition of immortal flower Kimjongilia, exhibition of books and photos and remembrance concert.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls on All Koreans to Open Gate to National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls on All Koreans to Open Gate to National Reunification
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- All Koreans in the north, south and overseas should open the gate to national reunification full of fresh confidence upholding the slogan laid down in the joint New Year editorial, says Rodong Sinmun Tuesday in a bylined article. 
					National reunification is the most urgent demand vital to the Korean nation, the article says, adding it is an expression of genuine patriotism to fight for reunification.
					
					The article goes on:
					
					It constitutes supreme patriotism for the Koreans today to devote their all to the drive for national reunification. 
					
					The banner to be held by the Korean nation at present is the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration. 
					
					The stand and attitude toward the declarations are a touchstone distinguishing national independence from dependence on foreign forces, reconciliation from confrontation and reunification from division in relations between the north and the south. Supporting and fully implementing the north-south declarations, guide of independent reunification, provides a sure guarantee for independent reunification and national prosperity, long-cherished desire of the Korean nation. 
					
					All the fellow countrymen living in the era of independent reunification should unite as one under the banner of "By Korean nation itself" and dynamically push forward the reunification movement, keeping in mind that independent dignity and prosperity of the nation hinge on them.
					
					The reunification movement has faced big difficulties by the desperate challenges on the part of the anti-reunification forces. This situation demands all the Koreans unite and fight with decisiveness, unusual spirit, confidence in victory and optimism. 
					
					The reunification movement will make more dynamic progress this year thanks to the ever-victorious Songun politics and the firm determination of the fellow countrymen to open the gate to national reunification without fail.

articles.title: S. Korean Military's War Hysteria Slammed: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Military's War Hysteria Slammed: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Defense Ministry in a recent "2012 work report" called for maintaining "attitude of prompt and resolute punishment" and training "combat-type strong forces", alleging again "there remains possibility of provocation" from someone. 
					The military in the report specified that "In case of enemy provocation, it will strike back the provocateurs and supporters till the threats are completely removed", an indication of its dangerous doctrine for a war. 
					
					In another development, the U.S. and the puppet forces announced they would sign the "plan to jointly cope with a limited warfare to be provoked by somebody" within January and start regular joint exercises from the first half of this year. 
					
					Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says in a bylined commentary in this regard:
					
					This serious politically-motivated military provocation against the DPRK is aimed to make a fait accompli the theory of "provocation from the north" in a bid to justify the outbreak of a war and ignite a war against the north in collusion with outside forces at any cost.
					
					The publication of the report amounts to a declaration of war against the DPRK.
					
					What should not be overlooked is that traitor Lee Myung Bak eggs on puppet warmongers to fan up hysteria.  In his recent "special New Year address on state policy" he blared that a "strong counteraction will be taken at a time of provocation", crying out for adoption of "impregnable security posture".
					
					The puppet military was known to have decided to additionally deploy various watch and precision striking means on the five islands in the West Sea under the pretext of "increasing the capabilities to defend the islands in the northwestern area". The military is also set to strengthen the "troop information and education" to help soldiers "establish the view on security" under the pretext of "liquidation of forces subjugated to the north".
					
					But, this is the last-ditch efforts of those whose days are numbered. There is no way out for the group of traitors. The enraged Korean nation will mete out stern punishment to them.

articles.title: S. Korea: Students Are Mobilized in War Drills
articles.content:
S. Korea: Students Are Mobilized in War Drills
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- The 1st Division of the Marine Corps of the south Korean puppet army has mobilized students of middle and high schools across south Korea in the anti-DPRK war drills from Monday. 
					The warmongers are enforcing on the students such all drills conducted by the marine corps as combat exercises of various forms, basic drills for guerrilla warfare and airlift, use of rubber boats for landing, boarding armored vehicles and combat swimming. 
					
					The war drills will reportedly last for five days.

articles.title: Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK Supported Abroad
articles.content:
Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK Supported Abroad
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Peruvian and Guinean organizations released bulletins on Jan. 3 in support of the joint New Year editorial of Rodong Sinmun, Joson Inmingun and Chongnyon Jonwi, leading newspapers of the DPRK.
					The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism in its bulletin carried a photo of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a photo of the dear respected Kim Jong Un inspecting a unit of the Korean People's Army and an article which said:
					
					The demise of Kim Jong Il, the genius of ideology and theory, veteran statesman representing the times and brilliant commander of Songun, is a great loss to the Koreans and the peoples the world over.
					
					The Korean people will continue to step up the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of Kim Jong Un by turning their sorrow into strength and courage.
					
					The joint New Year editorial serves as the banner of struggle for the victory in the cause of building a thriving nation as it indicated tasks and ways to be carried out by the Korean people in 2012.
					
					The cause of Juche and the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu will be creditably carried forward by Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the party, state and army of the DPRK, forever.
					
					The Guinean Preparatory Committee for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung and the Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea jointly issued a bulletin, which carried the full text of the joint editorial "Glorify this year 2012 as a year of proud victory, a year when an era of prosperity is unfolding, true to the instructions of the great General Kim Jong Il".

articles.title: Beninese Hail Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK
articles.content:
Beninese Hail Joint New Year Editorial of DPRK
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Personages of Benin issued statements in support of the joint New Year editorial of the DPRK.
					Ali Houdou, president of the Socialist Party of Benin, said in his statement on Jan. 3:
					
					The joint New Year editorial published by leading newspapers of the DPRK noted that the sacred cause of the DPRK advanced along the road of victory shown by leader Kim Jong Il even under the unprecedentedly complicated international circumstances last year.
					
					We are convinced that the DPRK will invariably advance along the road of socialism under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un, supreme leader, despite any rapidly-changing international situation and any desperate obstructive moves of the imperialists.
					
					The Socialist Party of Benin will as ever fully support the Korean people in their struggle to keep the idea of independence, friendship and peace and defend the cause of socialism.
					
					Hessou Kohovi, chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" and chairman of the Benin National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea and of General Kim Jong Il's Works, in a statement on Jan. 2 expressed belief that the Korean people would bring about a decisive turn in the cause of national reunification this year, holding high the slogan "Let all the compatriots open the gates of national reunification full of fresh confidence!".
					
					We will firmly stand on the side of the Korean people who adhere to the stand of giving priority to national independence and putting the nation above anything else, subordinate everything to the common interests of the nation and advance under the unfurled banner of anti-war and peace, the statement said.

articles.title: Nigerian Personage on Might of DPRK Socialist System
articles.content:
Nigerian Personage on Might of DPRK Socialist System
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, released a statement on Dec. 31 last year in support of the statement of the DPRK National Defence Commission which declared that it would surely force the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to pay for its hideous crimes committed at the time of the great misfortune of the nation.
					Expressing support for the NDC statement, he said:
					
					How could the group let right-wing conservative reactionary organizations flock to the forefront areas to scatter anti-DPRK leaflets whose content was hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and inciting disturbance? How could it put the three services of the puppet army on an emergency alert and order them to adopt combat posture, creating a war-like atmosphere on the ground and in the sea and air in the period of mourning?
					
					This is really unimaginable and unpardonable evil act.
					
					The Juche idea followers in Nigeria are well aware that any machinations and force can never collapse the socialist system of the DPRK shining with Juche, powerful with Songun and steadfast with single-minded unity.
					
					The DPRK will hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as its eternal sun and dynamically advance under the leadership of the dear respected General Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Cote d'Ivoire President Sets forth Government Tasks for New Year
articles.content:
Cote d'Ivoire President Sets forth Government Tasks for New Year
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Cote d'Ivoire President Alassane Ouattara in a New Year address referred to the tasks of his government.
					He underlined the need to further strengthen the army, repair the army barracks and keep them in good condition.
					
					He also stressed the need to focus on the politics, economy and all other fields to register substantial achievements, the economic growth, in particular.
					
					He emphasized the need for the government to tighten the state discipline, attach foremost importance to labor and promote the unity among people.

articles.title: Turkey Condemns Jewish Settlements on Occupied Palestinian Territories
articles.content:
Turkey Condemns Jewish Settlements on Occupied Palestinian Territories
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Turkey on Friday condemned the Jewish settlements on the occupied Palestinian territories, the Turkish Foreign Ministry said in an official statement on January 6.
					Turkey strongly condemned Jewish settlement activities in East Jerusalem, including a decision to erect 300 additional residences in Pisgat Zeev and Har Homa settlements and another decision to nationalize 13 decares (0.013 square kms) of land that actually belonged to the Palestinians, the statement said.
					
					The settlements were in open violation of international laws, said the statement, adding that Israel's attitude posed a serious risk to the two-state solution to the Palestinian-Israeli issue and made it difficult to reach a permanent solution in negotiations.

articles.title: Russia Bolsters Efforts to Update Subs
articles.content:
Russia Bolsters Efforts to Update Subs
Moscow, January 9 (KCNA) -- Russia is concentrating its efforts on modernizing its sub force.
					A spokesman for the Russian Navy on Jan. 7 said that the navy is planning to build multipurpose strategic nuclear subs and upgrade the composition of the diesel-powered subs.
					
					Under the plan the Russian navy envisages the possession of 8-10 latest diesel subs up till 2020.
					
					Those subs will be rigged with elements ensuring stealth and independent voyage.

articles.title: Iranian Army Kicks off Military Drills
articles.content:
Iranian Army Kicks off Military Drills
Tehran, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Islamic Revolution Guards Corps of Iran kicked off military exercises in its eastern area beginning from Jan. 7.
					The commander of the Iran army of the corps in his remark said the main purpose of the military drills is to ensure the security of the borders and bolster the combat readiness of the army.
					
					During the military maneuvers the Guards Corps will improve the army's strategy and tactics in various military operations and introduce innovative tactical initiatives.

articles.title: Iranian Navy Commander: Regional Countries Should Protect Security Together
articles.content:
Iranian Navy Commander: Regional Countries Should Protect Security Together
Tehran, January 9 (KCNA) -- Navy commander of Iran said that regional security should be protected by all countries of the region.
					Rear Admiral Habibollah Sayyari said on Saturday that our ability is upon our needs adding that world arrogant powers want to dominate the region and we should protect and defend our interests.
					
					Saying that Iran armed forces have enough ability to protect security in the Middle East, he added that the recent 'Velayat 90' naval maneuver provided it.

articles.title: 10 NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan Since Early January
articles.content:
10 NATO Soldiers Killed in Afghanistan Since Early January
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Ten service members with the NATO-led International Security Assistance Force have lost their lives in Afghanistan since the beginning of this year.
					The latest casualties for the military alliance in Afghanistan were the killing of four soldiers in the restive southern region on Friday, bringing its casualties to ten since the beginning of this year.

articles.title: Eurozone Unemployment Rate Rises
articles.content:
Eurozone Unemployment Rate Rises
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- 23.674 million men and women in the EU were unemployed in November by worsening debt crisis and financial market turbulences.
					Compared with October, the number of persons unemployed increased by 55 000 in the EU and by 45 000 in the eurozone.
					
					The European Union's statistical bureau Eurostat said this on Friday.

articles.title: 2 Dead, 8 Wounded in New Orleans Shootings
articles.content:
2 Dead, 8 Wounded in New Orleans Shootings
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Four shootings in a 9-hour period in New Orleans, Louisiana State, U.S., left two American people dead and eight wounded, including five shot after a basketball game, police said Saturday.

articles.title: Heavy Snow in Austria Causes Damage
articles.content:
Heavy Snow in Austria Causes Damage
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Days of heavy snow that hit Tirol State of Austria left railway electric wires cut off as of Jan. 8.
					Some sections of roads were blocked, paralyzing traffics.

articles.title: President of Niger Assigns New Year Tasks to Soldiers
articles.content:
President of Niger Assigns New Year Tasks to Soldiers
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Mahamadou Issoufou, president of Niger, in a New Year address on Jan. 5 assigned the service personnel the tasks to protect the lives and properties of the people and preserve the environment.  
					It is the most patriotic work before the servicepersons, he said, calling them a backbone of the country.
					
					Only when the backbone is reliable, can the state meet all the potential challenges, he added.
					
					He stressed the need to further consolidate the unity and cohesion within the army, increase its operational and information-gathering capacities, introduce the sophisticated hardware and intensify training.

articles.title: Noda's Support Rating Falls to 35.7% from 44.6%
articles.content:
Noda's Support Rating Falls to 35.7% from 44.6%
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Social mistrust rises in Japan as the present cabinet pursues false policy.
					Public support for Prime Minister Yoshihiko Noda's Cabinet has fallen to 35.7 percent, from 44.6 percent last month, with more than half -- 50.5 percent -- expressing disapproval for the first time since Noda took office in September, a Kyodo News poll showed Sunday.
					
					Nearly three quarters of the respondents, or 74.4 percent, said Noda's explanations about the tax plan were insufficient.

articles.title: Japan Ground SDF Holds Military Drills
articles.content:
Japan Ground SDF Holds Military Drills
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Japan Ground "Self-Defence Force" held military maneuvers in Narasino drill ground in Chiba Prefecture on Jan. 8.
					Paratroopers belonging to the air assault division No. 1 descended from transport planes and helicopters.
					
					The military drills staged from the outset of the New Year signal the Japanese reactionaries' intention to step up the reinvasion moves this year.

articles.title: Bomb Explosions Kill Many People in Iraq
articles.content:
Bomb Explosions Kill Many People in Iraq
Pyongyang, January 10 (KCNA) -- Large-scale chain bomb explosions took place in Iraq on Thursday.
					Forty-five people lost their lives by a suicide bomb attack in Nasiriyah City during an Islamic event.
					
					Earlier, twelve were killed by a motorcycle explosion in Baghdad and Sadr City and another fifteen were killed in two bomb attacks in Kazimiya.

articles.title: Chinese University Party Committees Urged to Enhance Their Role
articles.content:
Chinese University Party Committees Urged to Enhance Their Role
Beijing, January 9 (KCNA) -- The Chinese vice president called for intensifying the party work in universities.
					Speaking at the 20th national meeting of university party officials held some days ago, Xi Jinping described universities as important centers of educating and training young talents and important bases of arming young people with the socialist hardcore value system.
					
					He called on the party officials to consider it as their major duty to bring up excellent builders of and reliable successors to the cause of socialism with Chinese characteristics, thereby providing a definite ideological, political and organizational guarantee to building socialist universities, capable of training students with high qualifications.
					
					He urged university party committees to enhance their leading and pivotal role and encourage broad masses of party members to fully discharge their vanguard and exemplary role.

articles.title: Iran Ready for Exporting Nuclear Energy Service: Atomic Chief
articles.content:
Iran Ready for Exporting Nuclear Energy Service: Atomic Chief
Tehran, January 9 (KCNA) -- The head of Iran's Atomic Energy Organization on Saturday said that his country is ready for exporting the nuclear energy-related service.
					Speaking at an exhibition of the country's nuclear achievements held in Bandar Abbas, southern province of Hormozgan, Fereidoon Abbasi said Iran is able to produce 20 percent enriched uranium with 3-G centrifuges and that the country is also capable of producing heavy water needed for medical treatment.
					
					Underground uranium enrichment facilities will start operation in the country in the near future, he added.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de condolencias del presidente argelino
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe mensaje de condolencias del presidente argelino
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- El Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, Kim Jong Un, recibio un mensaje de condolencias que con motivo del deceso del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, le remitiera el dia 2 el presidente de la Republica Argelina Democratica y Popular, Abdelaziz Bouteflika.
					El texto del mensaje sigue:
					
					Recibi con mucha tristeza la informacion sobre el deceso de Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					Extiendo a Su Excelencia las mas sinceras condolencias en nombre del pueblo y el gobierno argelinos y en el mio propio y le hago llegar la firme solidaridad al igual que al amistoso pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					Quedaran registradas en la historia las proezas realizadas por Su Excelencia Kim Jong Il, gran hombre quien dedico todo lo suyo por la prosperidad de la RPDC y su pueblo.
					
					Argelia recordara siempre como amigo a el quien se ha esforzado mucho por fortalecer las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre ambos paises.
					
					Reciba mi mas alta consideracion.

articles.title: Se decreta amnistia en la RPDC
articles.content:
Se decreta amnistia en la RPDC
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 100o aniversario del natalicio del Presidente       Kim Il Sung y del 70o de nacimiento del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, se aplicara desde el dia primero de febrero una amnistia para los condenados como culpables.
					El Consejo de Ministros y otros organos competentes tomaran las medidas practicas para que los excarcelados por amnistia puedan trabajar y vivir con estabilidad.
					
					Fue publicado el dia 5 el decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.

articles.title: Supermercado del Area de Kwangbok
articles.content:
Supermercado del Area de Kwangbok
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- El Supermercado del Area de Kwangbok inicia sus actividades.
					Tiene gran capacidad de exhibicion y conservacion de mercancias y se han informatizado y computarizado todos los procesos del servicio y administracion como almacenaje, deposito, entrega, venta y liquidacion de cuenta.
					
					El Supermercado realiza su gestion segun el sistema de control automatico por computadora desde el recibo despues del examen, almacenaje, entrega, venta, calculo de precio y otras actividades administrativas.
					
					Las cajas automaticas cumplen la funcion de servicio basico del sistema de control automatico de la administracion.
					
					Cuando se venden las mercancias, su nombre, cantidad y precio estan registrados inmediatamente en el mencionado sistema y el resultado administrativo entra en la base de informacion general protegida por el sistema de certificado electronico, de manera que previene el flujo de la informacion comercial.
					
					En la aerea tan vasta hay muchos mostradores y vitrinas, llenos de mercancias, sin ninguna dificultad  a los clientes.
					
					El Supermercado tiene el sistema estatal de aseguramiento de mercancias.
					
					Por lo tanto, recibe los excelentes productos de las fabricas de la industria ligera y las bases de produccion de alimentos de la central y localidades, asi como de otros paises.
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il lo visito en diciembre del ano pasado, ocasion en la cual dijo que debe satisfacer, cueste lo que cueste, la demanda de los habitantes y  tomo las medidas necesarias.
					
					El enfatizo que lo primordial en el servicio es ofrecer las comodidades a los habitantes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exhorta a abrir puertas de reunificacion de patria
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exhorta a abrir puertas de reunificacion de patria
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- Todos los connacionales del Norte, el Sur y en ultramar deben abrir las puertas de la reunificacion de la patria con la nueva fe bajo la consigna indicada en el editorial conjunto del Ano Nuevo.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este martes y continua:
					
					La reunificacion de la patria es la demanda vital de impostergable cumplimiento para la nacion coreana.
					
					El sacrificio por la reunificacion de la patria constituye la maxima muestra de patriotismo para los coreanos.
					
					La bandera de lucha a ser tomada hoy por ellos es la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre.
					
					La posicion y la actitud sobre estas declaraciones son la pauta que distingue a los partidarios de la independencia nacional, la unidad y la reunificacion y a los que persiguen la dependencia de las fuerzas foraneas, el enfrentamiento fratricida entre el Norte y el Sur y la division. Apoyar y ejecutar las declaraciones Norte-Sur, hojas de ruta de la reunificacion independiente, es la garantia fundamental de la reunificacion independiente y prosperidad nacional que desean tanto los compatriotas.
					
					Todos los connacionales de la epoca de reunificacion independiente deben impulsar dinamicamente el movimiento por la reunificacion uniendose segun el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales" y dandose cuenta de que la dignidad independiente y la prosperidad eterna de la nacion dependen de si mismos.
					
					La realidad de hoy en que debido a los brutales desafios de las fuerzas anti-reunificacion, se crean graves dificultades ante el movimiento por la reunificacion de la patria, demanda a todos los connacionales que se unan y luchen con la ferrea decision, el indoblegable espiritu, la conviccion y optimismo de la victoria.
					
					Gracias a la invencible politica de Songun y a la firme voluntad de los connacionales de abrir a toda costa las puertas de la reunificacion de la patria, el movimiento por cumplir esta causa dara grandes pasos este ano.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun critica informe de trabajo del ministerio surcoreano
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun critica informe de trabajo del ministerio surcoreano
Pyongyang, 10 de enero (ACNC) -- Hace pocos dias, el Ministerio de Defensa del Sur de Corea apunto en su "informe de trabajo de 2012" que "queda todavia la posibilidad de provocacion" de alguien y que "formaria un poderoso ejercito combativo" manteniendo la "disposicion de represalia inmediata y rotunda". E inserto en ese informe esta doctrina de guerra: "en el caso de la provocacion de enemigos, hay que responder resueltamente a ella y atacar las fuentes de provocacion y a las fuerzas de apoyo hasta que fuera eliminada completamente la amenaza". 
					Por otra parte, Estados Unidos y los titeres surcoreanos anunciaron oficialmente que firmaran dentro de enero el "plan de operaciones conjuntas para hacer frente a la provocacion local" y libraran periodicamente los correspondientes ejercicios conjuntos desde el primer semestre del ano en curso. 
					
					El diario Rodong Sinmun, en un comentario individual de este martes, lo califica de otra grave provocacion politica y militar contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y prosigue:
					
					Esos pasos parten de la aventurera intencion de la cupula militar surcoreana de justificar sus acciones belicistas y desatar sin falta la guerra de agresion contra la RPDC en contubernio con las fuerzas extranjeras haciendo hecho consumado la supuesta "provocacion del Norte". 
					
					El citado informe de trabajo es precisamente la declaracion de guerra contra la RPDC. 
					
					Lo que no se puede pasar por alto es que el traidor Lee Myung Bak fomenta al frente el belicismo de sus subordinados militares. 
					
					En su reciente "discurso especial de la politica estatal para el Ano Nuevo", Lee disparateo sin titubeo que "tomaria fuertes contramedidas en el caso de provocacion" hablando de la "firme disposicion de seguridad". 
					
					Segun trascendidos, la capa militar surcoreana decidio emplazar adicionalmente este ano en los alrededores de las cinco islas del Mar Oeste los medios de vigilancia y de ataque a precision de todo tipo pretextando el "mejoramiento de la capacidad defensiva de las islas del noroeste" e intensificar la "educacion politica" para los soldados para "establecerles la concepcion de seguridad" bajo el rotulo de "eliminar a las fuerzas seguidoras al Norte". 
					
					Pero, todo eso no pasa de ser el ultimo coletazo de los que tienen los dias contados. 
					
					La banda del traidor Lee no tiene salida y sera condenada severamente por la indignada nacion coreana.
